Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment
book: 2681-Bambu Earth Intense Hydration Cactus Concentrate  (2020 formulation)

chunk:
Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Prickly Pear Seed Oil, Murumuru, Organic Raw Fair Trade Shea Butter, Mango Butter, Kukui Nut Oil, Organic Cold-Pressed Tamanu Oil, Baobab Oil, Blue Tansy Essential Oil, Helichrysum Essential Oil, Turmeric Essential Oil, Frankincense Essential Oil, and Rosemary Antioxidant Extract.
book: 2681-Bambu Earth Intense Hydration Cactus Concentrate  (2020 formulation)

chunk:
Directions: 1
After AM/PM cleansing and toning, warm a dime-sized amount between palms.

2
Press into wet skin over the entire face and neck.

3
Pay extra attention to areas of concern such as puffiness, dark circles or fine lines around the eye area.
